data.title: Salt Lake County Arts & Culture
data.meta_description: Your Eccles Theater experience starts the minute you enter from busy Main Street into the spectacular five-story glass lobby.  The distinctive chandeliers, colorful balustrades, and striking terrazzo floor remind you that you are in for a memorable experience.  In addition to…Read more
data.text:
Eccles Theater Guest Services

Concessions

Concessions for Delta Hall are located in the main lobby, on the first tier and on the second tier in the North lobby. Regent Street Black Box concessions are located in the lobby just outside the theater. Western Foods offers gourmet candies, baked treats, and beverages including bottled water, Coca-Cola products, coffee, and craft or domestic beers. They accept cash, Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover Card. All concession snacks and beverages are allowed in Eccles Theater seating areas. As a courtesy to those around you, please eat and drink as quietly as possible.

Tin Angel at the Eccles

Tin Angel, Salt Lake’s hip Farm-to-Table bistro with an eclectic menu of European dishes, is the resident restaurant of the George S. and Dolores Doré Eccles Theater in Salt Lake City. Located on the south side of the luminous Eccles Lobby, Tin Angel at the Eccles is a full-service restaurant offering a full wine and craft cocktail menu.

Tin Angel is reopening for pre-show dining for evening performances beginning October 26 with Disney's Frozen. Reservations are now open and are strongly recommended in advance of your show. For more information or to make reservations visit thetinangel.com. Reservations can also be explored below:

Reserve at Tin Angel Cafe on Yelp

Accessibility Services

Elevators to each level for Delta Hall. Elevator from Regent Street Black Box lobby to the Black Box.

Eccles Theater is accessible to people with disabilities and offers wheelchair seating, curbside assistance, and assisted listening devices. If you have any requests or concerns regarding wheelchair and companion seating or need other accommodations, including listening devices, ASL interpreter services, or captioning services, please contact ArtTix at 801-355-ARTS (2787) or 1-888-451-ARTS (2787) or by email at arttix@slco.org. Patrons should Dial 711 for Telecommunications Relay Service (TRS).

Restrooms

Restrooms are available on all levels.

Coat Check

Coat check is available in the lobby near concessions. This service is available to all patrons free of charge. Please note bags and backpacks cannot be stored at coat check.

Booster Seats

We have booster seat cushions available on a first-come first-served basis for Delta Hall. The cushions are primarily for children and petite adults. Cushions are distributed at the theater’s coat check stand.

Outdoor Terraces

Outdoor terraces with scenic city views are available to all patrons on the second and third tiers. Terraces are open before, during and after performances.

Merchandise Sales

Merchandise is available for most performances. Contact arts-info@slco.org for further information about specific performances.

Parking and Transportation

Parking is not available at Eccles Theater. However, the Regent Street Garage is conveniently located behind Eccles Theater. Ample metered parking and paid lots are also nearby

In addition, TRAX stations and bus stops are conveniently located throughout downtown Salt Lake City to help make transportation easy. The TRAX stop nearest to Eccles Theater is City Center Station on the Blue and Green lines.

Lost and Found

If you have misplaced an item at Eccles Theater please contact lost and found at 385-468-2519 for assistance.

Eccles Theater Large Bag Policy

For the safety and security of our patrons and performers, the Eccles Theater does not allow bags or backpacks larger than 12 inches by 12 inches by 6 inches into Delta Performance Hall or the Regent Street Black Box. Eccles Theater does not have check-in areas or lockers for bags that are over the size limit, so please plan ahead. There are exceptions for medical equipment or diaper bags.

The following items are permitted in the Theater and are subject to inspection:

Cell phones

Binoculars

Handbags smaller than 12”X12”X6”

Diaper bags

Medical equipment

Personal water bottle

The following items are not allowed in the Theater:

Backpacks, large handbags, sealed bags or packages of any type

Large handbags are any bags over 12”x12”x6”

Outside food or beverages including alcohol, flasks, or cans

Alcohol and other refreshments are available in the venue from a licensed vendor

No smoking, including e-cigarettes or vaping allowed in the venue

Controlled substances

Laser pointers or noisemakers of any type

Video or audio recorders

GoPros, laptop computers, Google Glasses, cameras or any other electronic transmitting devices

Please note, prohibited items cannot be checked at the Theater. Patrons will be asked to return items to their cars before entering the Theater. Thank you in advance for not bringing these into the Theater and for your understanding.

Box Seat Sponsor Take Center Stage

Anticipation for the upcoming Broadway at the Eccles season is at an all-time high and season tickets will sell out. Demand for Live at the Eccles concerts, lectures, comedy and family events has been equally high with shows regularly selling out in advance. Now, as an exclusive Eccles Theater Box Seat Sponsor, you can not only support the arts in your community but you can guarantee your access to these sold out events at the spectacular Eccles Theater. Plus, Box Seats are the best way to impress your VIP’s or entertain business associates, employees, family and friends.

As a Box Seat Sponsor, you’ll enjoy a host of exclusive perks including:

Two designated Box Seats for a select evening or matinee performance during the Broadway at the Eccles Season

First-come, first serve access to purchase Box Seats to Live at the Eccles events*

Complimentary VIP parking conveniently located near the Theater

Access for two during every ticketed performance to the Larry H. and Gail Miller Family Foundation Lounge**

A personal ticket concierge to take care of all your ticketing needs, including ticket exchanges and additional seats in premium locations

Special recognition in the Broadway at the Eccles playbills

Box Seat Sponsorship Packages start at $3,000.

To discuss sponsorship opportunities, contact Donor Services Manager, Tori Wood at (385)-468-2502 or towood@slco.org.

Thank you to our partners!

The Eccles Theater is grateful to our partners whose support makes the world-class entertainment you see on our stage possible.

Series Sponsors
